a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of cancers diagnosed via screening in England by stage
Proportion of cancers diagnosed via screening by cancer stage. Cancer stages range from 1 to 4, with Stage 1
being early and localized, while Stage 4 is advanced and has spread to other parts of the body.
Data source: National Disease Registration Service (2024)
